entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Fog patches developing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late in the evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening then light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 06 January 2023
